US BANK HOLIDAY: January 15, 2024 – Incoming and outgoing USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused on Monday, January 15, 2024, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday (Martin Luther King Jr. Day) in the US on Monday, January 15, 2024, Bitstamp bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will not be available.

EUR SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish a peaceful Martin Luther King Jr. Day to our US customers.
